title: Learning City Design Through Culture: Participatory Space Analysis Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic geography and regional culture, basic smartphone proficiency
context.additional_context: Enhancing creative problem-solving abilities through spatial redesign projects utilizing local cultural heritage

learning_goals: Students can analyze the cultural context of learning space design using a local culture mapping tool.
Through participatory workshops, learners can propose learning space ideas integrating three or more cultural resources (history, oral records, digital archives).
Learners can present learning node design plans in visual/textual formats using mobile device-based spatial storytelling techniques.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
